body_html:
As a very quick solution, you may create symlinks to cudnn headers in /usr/local/cuda/include and to all cudnn libraries in /usr/local/cuda/lib64.
@flx42 Any idea about any changes in cudnn deb packages that may cause this?
body_text:
As a very quick solution, you may create symlinks to cudnn headers in /usr/local/cuda/include and to all cudnn libraries in /usr/local/cuda/lib64.
@flx42 Any idea about any changes in cudnn deb packages that may cause this?
body:
As a very quick solution, you may create symlinks to cudnn headers in `/usr/local/cuda/include` and to all cudnn libraries in `/usr/local/cuda/lib64`. 
@flx42 Any idea about any changes in cudnn deb packages that may cause this?
